ygData.subject: Exp gain while in parties.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Am I the only one with the impression that we re getting screwed when it comes to diving up the exp while grouped? I was in a party that ranged from level 9 to
ygData.messageBody:
Am I the only one with the impression that we're getting screwed when it
comes to diving up the exp while grouped? I was in a party that ranged from
level 9 to 12 while I was level 10. Everyone talked about the 'great exp'
they got, while I was thinking "Man they must never get any Exp". I asked
about what everyone got after a big fight and the results went something
like this:

Level 9 got almost a 1/3rd of a bubble
level 10-12 got close to 1/2 a bubble
Poor old Cinius the only Wizard in the party saving everyones ass had to
wait til the next fight to notice a combined total from both fights of 1/4
of a bubble. Is it like this for anyone else? Hell I get 1/4 of a bubble
when killing a yellow on my own. In my opinion that makes it worth the risk
of getting killed by the yellows(happens maybe once out of every 7-10
kills).

my apologies for the last double mail...had browser problems.

Cinius(Mith Marr)
